name: places/ChIJmwodHwJZwokRnP8BvZwFD0c
formattedAddress: 200 Park Ave, New York, NY 10166, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 Park Ave, New York, NY 10166, USA

originalText.text: Very smooth process. We made our reservation on spothero app and we arrived half hour early. The young lady who checked us in was very pleasant. Told us we are just going to pay for half hour more at the checkout. All of the staff are pleasant and very helpful at giving directions. Very clean. Most of all, the price is very customer friendly/affordable. Thank you to all the staff. I always dread coming to New York due to traffic and parking problems but you made this trip less stressful.

originalText.text:
One of the best parking experiences I had in my entire life!
I had booked from the spot hero, upon arrival everyone was extremely helpful.
My needs special assistance on wheelchair, the attendant was very patient and kind to help me out with everything.
Furthermore, they helped guiding us to nearby area and show best possible way to go to grand Central station using wheelchair.
Area is very well clean and good access to MetLife building as well

originalText.text:
Noon. People standing around not knowing what the process is. Cars backing up. Looks like 2 people working. Long line at cashier. Cashier is parking cars. People frustrated.  I am blocked in or I would leave. Cars blocking street.
Take your own chances. Absolute joke of a business.

originalText.text:
Beware of parking here. Nice facility, nice people (I thought) but my car DOES NOT met the oversize requirements, not even close, nothing said when parking but when I returned the automated kiosk added a $15 charge on top of what I had already paid. No choice but to pay it. SCAM.

UPDATE: Don't believe the response from the buisness; I sent them all the information they could possibly need to show I was overcharged and they've haven't even responded. They use that boilerplate line so it looks like they are concerned.

UPDATE: I stand corrected, managment contacted me and they are making it right, so I'm giving them high marks for being responsive and as stated before, this is a really nice garage so I'm glad I'll be able to park there again.

originalText.text:
I parked here with a pristine, 8-month old white car with no dings.
I left with scrapes on my back bumper that had been messily “touched up” with what looks like White Out. I discovered this damage soon after I valet parked here. No one else had driven my car, nor did I park it in another public garage. Extremely disappointing.
